lead_paragraph: Daria Gavrilova will be allowed to play for her adopted home country when Australia hosts the United States in the Fed Cup World Group playoffs next month.

headline.print_headline: New Australian Gavrilova to Play vs US in Fed Cup in April
headline.main: New Australian Gavrilova to Play vs US in Fed Cup in April

snippet: Daria Gavrilova will be allowed to play for her adopted home country when Australia hosts the United States in the Fed Cup World Group playoffs next month....
